name: AutoSwitchArt
description: 打开需要软件时隐藏Art，杀软件后修复inlinehook
condition: if (frontPkgChanged == true)if globalVarOf$HookedApps.contains(from)) {ui.showShortToast("exit HookedApps,hide art");ui.showShortToast("" + su.exe("resetprop --delete dalvik.vm.dex2oat-flags"));} else{ ui.showShortToast("exit NoHookedApps,fix inline hook");ui.showShortToast("" + su.exe("resetprop --delete dalvik.vm.dex2oat-flags;resetprop dalvik.vm.dex2oat-flags --inline-max-code-units=0"));}
